data.title: Advanced Technology Group
data.text:
Welcome to the IBM Advanced Technology Group "Accelerate with ATG" webinar series. These informative webinars give you the ability to learn technical details about IBM Storage Systems and related solutions. These topics are technical in nature and include How-to, How-it-works, and Hints and Tips and/or Live Demonstrations. This knowledge sharing series is open to all our Clients, Business Partners, and IBMers. Panelists are available to monitor and respond to your questions during the event. If you want to join our mailing list, send an email to accelerate-join@hursley.ibm.com or check out our IBM ATG - Storage MediaCenter Channel below. If you have any questions, please contact BethAnn Stugis.

ATG MediaCenter Channel

Upcoming 2024 Webinar Sessions:

IBM C-Type SAN Analytics: Real-time and Always-on SAN Performance visibility at Scale - July 23rd, 2024

Revolutionizing Data Archiving-IBM S3 Deep Archive on Diamondback - July 25th, 2024

IBM Fusion and RedHat OpenShift Virtualization - August 6th, 2024

Upcoming 2024 Client Workshops:

The Advanced Technology Group Storage Team provides technical sales support to IBM Storage Sellers and Business Partners exclusively in the Americas, concentrating on North America. The ATG Storage Team offers workshops for IBMers, Business Partners and with clients looking to invest in new IBM Storage solutions.

If you are interested in attending one of the following workshops, please reach out to your IBM Representative or Business Partner to find out how you can register.

IBM DS8900F Advanced Functions

The workshop is intended for Americas clients interested in migrating their disk environment from Dell and Hitachi to the IBM DS8900F; and for customers upgrading their legacy IBM DS8000 to the current DS8900F solution.

IBM Fusion and Ceph ATG Workshop - A Deep Dive into Next Gen Storage: August 21-22, 2024 - Atlanta, GA

This workshop will provide a deep dive into how IBM Fusion and Ceph will accelerate your organizations application modernization and new application development and move to Red Hat Openshift and watsonx. Topics covered are industry trends, key use cases and success stories. IBM Storage for watsonx overview and why IBM Storage featuring IBM Fusion, IBMStorage Scale and IBM Ceph.

IBM FlashSystem Deep Dive & Advanced Functions: September 18-19, 2024 - Paramus, NJ

This workshop is intended for Americas clients with an immediate requirement to upgrade from disk, first generation SSD and Flash storage systems, to the high-performance feature rich IBM FlashSystem line. This workshop covers FlashSystem 5200, 7300, and 9500 products.

Cyber Resilience with IBM Storage Defender: July 17-18, 2024 - VIRTUAL

This workshop is intended for Americas clients that are interested in learning how IBM Storage Defender provides a powerful set of capabilities that is unparalleled in the industry and can help you quickly recover from an attack and avoid paying a ransom. This workshop will cover the risks that a Cyber-Resilient solution must overcome and how to build that solution with IBM Storage.
